ISSUE.TITLE: Adding widget to flowpart does not consider the IsNew context used from driver.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Adding a widget to a flow part with various fields that allow setting default values when new instance is created (like numeric field, boolean field) is not respected. Example: Add a widget with a nemric field and set its default value to 100\. Then add the widget to the flow part . The default value in editor is ignored. This is because of https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/blob/acee23ef121a09568198ebda164d591ae9f084ed/src/OrchardCore.Modules/OrchardCore.Widgets/Views/ContentCard.cshtml#L22 setting the Isnew context variable to false.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: set isNew to true when buidling editor (#6077) fixes #6076
